short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Shows Facebook email notifications completely in Gmail™.
short.de: Zeigt die Facebook Benachrichtungen komplett in Gmail™ an.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you enable notifications on Facebook, you have the ability to enable notifications by mail.
In the past, Facebook would add the complete description to those mails. However, since a few months they cut it off.

This extension brings it back, while having performance in mind and it doesn't collect any user data.
The Code is Open-Source on GitHub: https://github.com/kurtextrem/Gmail-FB-Expander
